BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.BlockRam.File.blockRamFile#
BlackBox.type:
blockRamFile#
  :: ( KnownNat m             -- ARG[0]
     , HasCallStack )         -- ARG[1]
  => Clock dom                -- clk,  ARG[2]
  => Enable dom               -- en,   ARG[3]
  -> SNat n                   -- sz,   ARG[4]
  -> FilePath                 -- file, ARG[5]
  -> Signal dom Int           -- rd,   ARG[6]
  -> Signal dom Bool          -- wren, ARG[7]
  -> Signal dom Int           -- wr,   ARG[8]
  -> Signal dom (BitVector m) -- din,  ARG[9]
  -> Signal dom (BitVector m)
